translation.en: I think the diamond… You know, the words, huh?
translation.zh: “钻石梦”这几个字

translation.en: "A diamond dream," um, probably something I just thought up, huh?
translation.zh: “钻石梦”这几个字 大概就是我想出来的

translation.en: [Lussier] But actually, it existed long before De Beers.
translation.zh: 但其实在戴比尔斯诞生之前很久 这个概念就存在了

translation.en: You know, it goes well back to the duke of Burgundy,
translation.zh: 这要追溯到勃艮第公爵

translation.en: apparently, according to legend, who gave the first diamond betrothal ring.
translation.zh: 传说他送出了 史上第一枚钻石订婚戒指

translation.en: No marketer told him to do so, huh?
translation.zh: 没有市场营销人员让他这样做

translation.en: And that core reason he did it is as true today as it was then,
translation.zh: 他这样做的核心原因 在今天与当时是一样的

translation.en: which is that he was seeking to send this symbol to his future wife
translation.zh: 他送给未来的妻子这样一件信物

translation.en: that she was precious to him,
translation.zh: 表明自己对她的珍爱

translation.en: and that this moment that they were marking was something precious.
translation.zh: 也表明他们庆祝的这一时刻非常珍贵

translation.en: No, because diamond cutting had just been perfected in Bruges,
translation.zh: 不对 是因为当时 钻石切割技术在布鲁日发展完善

translation.en: and he wanted Bruges as part of a multinational land deal
translation.zh: 他希望将布鲁日 作为一项跨国土地交易的一部分

translation.en: that involved marrying Mary of Burgundy.
translation.zh: 其中包括与勃艮第的玛丽结婚

translation.en: God, I wish people in history were named something other than Mary.
translation.zh: 天呐！真希望历史上的人物 别再取名“玛丽”了

translation.en: And I would assume he knows that, maybe.
translation.zh: 我认为他知道这一点 有可能

translation.en: But, no, it wasn't 'cause it was a precious object.
translation.zh: 但那并不是一件珍贵的物件

translation.en: It was a token, for sure.
translation.zh: 是一种象征 这是肯定的

translation.en: And he didn't give it to her. He gave it to her father.
translation.zh: 而且没给她 是给了她父亲

translation.en: [interviewer] The point being?
translation.zh: 重点是什么呢？

translation.en: The point being that that story is bunk.
translation.zh: 重点是这故事就是胡扯

translation.en: Or… it's what you make out of it.
translation.zh: 或者说牵强附会

translation.en: It's kind of like a diamond.
translation.zh: 有点像钻石

translation.en: It's an ugly rock that if you cut enough reflective windows into it,
translation.zh: 就是一颗丑陋的石头 如果切出足够多的反射窗口

translation.en: it looks like something else.
translation.zh: 它就有了另外一副模样

translation.en: The 92-carat D color flawless, heart-shaped diamond and pearl,
translation.zh: 92克拉D色无暇心型钻石及珍珠项链

translation.zh: 这是拍卖史上 最大的D色无暇心型钻石…

translation.en: [Raden] Like, those large diamonds, those famous diamonds,
translation.zh: 那些大钻 著名的钻石

translation.zh: 他们将其描绘成千载难逢的珍品

translation.en: and yet, every time you look,
translation.zh: 但是你每次去看

translation.zh: 苏富比或者佳士得拍卖行 又在拍卖另一件了

translation.zh: 这是拍卖史上最大的无暇D色钻石

translation.zh: 这是拍卖史上最大的梯方形切割钻石

translation.en: [Raden] But the truth is there are a lot of diamonds waiting for the company
translation.zh: 但事实上有很多钻石 等着公司找到一个好的理由

translation.en: to have a good reason to have a miraculous find,
translation.zh: 等着公司找到一个好的理由 把它描绘成绝世精品

translation.en: and then someone, let's say… someone with a skill set very much like mine,
translation.zh: 然后会聘请与我技能相似的人

translation.en: would be hired under nondisclosure terms
translation.zh: 签订保密协议

translation.en: to spin a sort of fantasy about how this diamond was found.
translation.zh: 来编写这颗钻石被发现的梦幻故事

translation.en: The story that I'm about to tell you surpasses all those
translation.zh: 我即将讲述的故事 超越我记忆中所有的故事

translation.en: that nourish my memory.
translation.zh: 超越我记忆中所有的故事

translation.en: Never shall I forget the miracle of the Queen of Kalahari.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记 “喀拉哈里女王”的奇迹

translation.en: [Raden] It has to be the right name and the right story.
translation.zh: 命名和故事都必须恰到好处

translation.en: They have origin stories, like superheroes.
translation.zh: 这些钻石都有起源故事 就像超级英雄一样

translation.en: [narrator] In the clouded mountains of Africa,
translation.zh: 非洲云雾缭绕的群山之中

translation.en: an incredible treasure was discovered.
translation.zh: 一件稀世珍宝终见天日

translation.en: It was an abandoned section of the mine, and it was just about to be closed down.
translation.zh: 其实是在矿场的废弃区域发现的 马上就要关掉了

translation.en: A miner found something glistening,
translation.zh: 一位矿工发现有东西在闪光

translation.en: and with a penknife, he picked it out.
translation.zh: 他用小刀将其挖出

translation.en: We weren't sure what it was, and…
translation.zh: 我们当时不确定是什么 然后…

translation.en: He took it to his surface manager, who looked at this great, big lump
translation.zh: 他拿给地面经理看 经理看了一下这块大东西 然后扔出窗外

translation.en: and threw it out the window, saying, "It's a piece of rock crystal."
translation.zh: 经理看了一下这块大东西 然后扔出窗外 说道：“就是一块石英石”

translation.en: And then, as we were taking one last look at it in the setting sun,
translation.zh: 然后在落日的余晖下 最后看了一眼这块石头

translation.en: we saw something glinting, and…
translation.zh: 看到有东西在闪 然后…

translation.en: The miner retrieved it, and they looked at it again,
translation.zh: 矿工把石头捡了回来 又看了一次

translation.en: and realized that it was a 3,106 carat rough diamond.
translation.zh: 发现这是一块3106克拉的原钻

translation.en: Lo and behold, it's this giant, beautiful diamond
translation.zh: 快来看呐 这颗巨大的美钻

translation.en: that will then be marketed with, you know,
translation.zh: 将会衬以日落的景象而推出市场

translation.en: vistas of a sunset with something that makes them think of Africa,
translation.zh: 将会衬以日落的景象而推出市场 令人联想起非洲

translation.en: as though Africa isn't a gigantic continent
translation.zh: 就仿佛非洲并不是一个巨型大陆

translation.en: comprised of dozens of countries,
translation.zh: 由数十个国家组成

translation.en: most of which have nothing to do with diamonds.
translation.zh: 其中大部分国家与钻石毫无干系

translation.en: Welcome to the Karowe mine!
translation.zh: 其中大部分国家与钻石毫无干系 欢迎来到卡洛维矿场！

translation.en: [Raden] But the truth is,
translation.zh: 但真相是

translation.en: it got pulled out by a bulldozer in a pile of dirt and waste,
translation.zh: 它混在一堆泥土和废物之中 由一台挖土机挖出

translation.en: and that is how it was discovered.
translation.zh: 这就是它的发现故事

translation.en: -Sold! -[applause]
translation.zh: 成交！

translation.en: So, it's like every origin story.
translation.zh: 所以它和所有起源故事一样

translation.en: It's been… embroidered.
translation.zh: 系渲染而成

translation.zh: 浪漫的爱情其实是比较新的概念

translation.en: is actually a fairly new concept that's probably less than 150 years old,
translation.zh: 浪漫的爱情其实是比较新的概念 其历史大概还不到150年

translation.en: let alone giving these expensive gifts as a token of… of that love.
translation.zh: 赠送昂贵的礼物作为爱的信物 就更不用说了

translation.en: That's even newer. That's 100 years old.
translation.zh: 这是更新的概念 100年历史

translation.en: -[interviewer] John, it is your business. -[Janik] It is my business. Yeah.
translation.zh: -约翰 这是你的生意 -这确实是我的生意

translation.en: But you don't have to buy somebody's story, buy the marketing.
translation.zh: 但是你不用相信别人讲的故事 不用相信营销话术

translation.en: I was that kid that would, like, ask questions like,
translation.zh: 我小时候会问这样的问题

translation.en: "If we're all descended from Adam and Eve, how… how come we're not all inbred?"
translation.zh: “如果我们都是亚当和夏娃的后代 那我们为什么不都是近亲繁殖？”

translation.en: And, you know, the answers I would get from adults were,
translation.zh: 大人们的回答是

translation.en: "Shut up. You don't ask questions like that."
translation.zh: “闭嘴” “不能问这种问题”

translation.en: And I realized, as a little kid,
translation.zh: 我小时候就发现

translation.en: if adults don't have good answers for these questions,
translation.zh: 如果大人无法很好地回答这些问题

translation.en: they don't know what the fuck they're talking about.
translation.zh: 那他们根本就不懂

translation.en: So my fundamental belief is that the value of diamond
translation.zh: 所以我基本的看法是 钻石的价值在于其技术能力

translation.en: is in its technological capability.
translation.zh: 钻石的价值在于其技术能力

translation.en: Diamond has the same transformative potential that silicon did have,
translation.zh: 钻石具有硅那样的变革潜力

translation.en: and I do think that probably within 15 to 20 years,
translation.zh: 我认为大概在15到20年内

translation.en: we'll see amazingly fast diamond transistors in a lot of our personal devices.
translation.zh: 我们会在许多个人设备上看到 速度极快的钻石晶体管

translation.en: [Janik] But we don't think of it that way.
translation.zh: 但我们并不这样去看待钻石

translation.en: We think of it as a gemstone, so, you know,
translation.zh: 我们把钻石看作宝石 所以我得去做应该做的事

translation.en: I got to do what I got to do,
translation.zh: 所以我得去做应该做的事

translation.en: which is make money by destroying a gem industry
translation.zh: 也就是通过摧毁一个宝石工业来赚钱

translation.en: to create a new industry that I think is more valuable.
translation.zh: 以创造一个我认为更有价值的新工业

translation.en: You know, creative destruction.
translation.zh: 创造性的破坏

translation.en: Isn't that… Wasn't that Shiva?
translation.zh: 这不就是湿婆做的事吗？

translation.zh: 印度有很多抛光工厂

translation.zh: 那是一个开放的市场

translation.zh: 全世界的钻石经销商 在那里设有办公室

translation.en: but the source of the stones…
translation.zh: 但是钻石的来源

translation.zh: 可以是任何地方

translation.zh: 合成钻石的原石外形是不同的

translation.en: But when the stone is polished and sent to the dealers,
translation.zh: 但经过抛光 然后发给经销商

translation.zh: 他们就不可能分辨 哪些是合成的 哪些是天然的

translation.en: They are polishing whatever. You can send him… what you have.
translation.zh: 你给他们什么 他们就抛光什么

translation.zh: 他们不会披露信息 而且也没人知道内情

translation.en: [Melvyn Thomas] This is a very secret trade.
translation.zh: 这是一个非常秘密的行业

translation.en: Very, very secret.
translation.zh: 极为秘密

translation.en: So, actually seeing… You can't.
translation.zh: 所以不可能真的让你看

translation.en: [interviewer] And what are they really scared about?
translation.zh: 他们到底害怕什么呢？

translation.en: They are scared, you know…
translation.zh: 他们害怕…

translation.en: They don't want things to be revealed.
translation.zh: 他们不希望事情被披露出去

translation.en: All the diamonds across the world,
translation.zh: 全世界所有的钻石

translation.zh: 或早或晚 都会来到苏拉特

translation.zh: 金额非常巨大 8到9亿美元

translation.zh: 钻石来到这里 不论是否合法

translation.zh: 都要以合法或者非法的方式销售出去

translation.zh: （国际宝石学院） 如果要赚快钱

translation.zh: 其实没人能监视你的不诚实行为

translation.zh: 因为被抓住才算偷

translation.zh: 在没被抓之前 你就是一个诚实的人

translation.zh: 问题不在于合成

translation.zh: 问题在于是合成钻石 但是不披露 这造成了恐惧

translation.zh: 可以说我们就是这个行业的警察

translation.zh: 但是确实会出问题

translation.zh: -这是欺诈 对吧？ -对 是欺诈 完全就是欺诈

translation.zh: 我在市场上有很多信息来源

translation.zh: 这种行为行之有年

translation.zh: 如今愈演愈烈

translation.zh: 但我们会抓到谁呢？

translation.zh: 谁会受到惩罚？

translation.zh: 我今天把话说清楚

translation.zh: 明天睡醒 我会假装没发生过这件事

translation.zh: 我12岁的时候搬来苏拉特生活

translation.zh: 当时我睡在钻石砂轮下 与蚊子为伴

translation.zh: 工厂里只有一个地方可以住人

translation.zh: 男孩们玩耍的年纪

translation.zh: 我却拿着钻石 这钻石对我们来说就是神

translation.zh: 我慢慢发现 我们并不是在为自己工作

translation.zh: 因为抛光钻石的人

translation.zh: 自己永远不可能拥有一颗钻石

translation.zh: 然后我得知 在中国有人在用一种新工艺生产钻石

translation.en: But after they are cut and polished,
translation.zh: 但是在切割并抛光之后

translation.zh: 先得经过一道工艺 才能使其与天然钻石无法区分

translation.zh: 在市场上与天然钻石混在一起？

translation.zh: 中国钻石与真钻混在一起？

translation.zh: 当然

translation.zh: 骗人与诋毁这个行业 现在已经成为一场游戏

translation.zh: 这种钻石 一大袋一大袋地进行切割和抛光

translation.zh: 这些钻石肯定有去处

translation.zh: 没人会用麻袋装满这些钻石藏在家里

translation.zh: 他们都是印度钻石工业的脊梁

translation.zh: 警方也没办法处理这个问题吗？

translation.zh: 看看做出了什么

translation.en: It looks heavily damaged.
translation.zh: 看起来损坏很严重

translation.en: These stones are completely graphitized.
translation.zh: 这些石头完全石墨化了

translation.en: Am I gonna be the person to legitimize lab-grown diamonds?
translation.zh: 我会将实验室培育钻石合法化吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna do that.
translation.zh: 我不会这样做

translation.en: But we have to invest. We have to go forward.
translation.zh: 但我们必须投资 必须向前走

translation.en: We cannot just keep doing business the way we were.
translation.zh: 不能永远按以前的方法做生意

translation.en: Prices are going down.
translation.zh: 价格在下降

translation.en: What the hell does that mean? What do you mean?
translation.zh: 这到底意味着什么？什么意思？

translation.en: How can prices of diamonds keep going down and down and down?
translation.zh: 钻石价格怎么会持续下降？

translation.en: What the hell is going on here?
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: Even the mining companies now don't have enough money to fix everything.
translation.zh: 连矿业公司 都没有足够的钱解决所有问题

translation.en: But a commitment of a billion dollars in marketing in actual diamonds
translation.zh: 但我今天在此呼吁各方 承诺在真钻营销上投入10亿美元

translation.en: is something I am calling for today, here and now.
translation.zh: 承诺在真钻营销上投入10亿美元

translation.en: [Simic] Don't underestimate me, you know.
translation.zh: 不要小看我

translation.en: Don't ignore me.
translation.zh: 不要无视我

translation.en: There is a limit, you know. There is a limit.
translation.zh: 人都是有底线的

translation.en: This is my job, you know. I cannot leave.
translation.zh: 这是我的工作 我不能离开

translation.en: [Rapaport] I am telling you that there is a bogeyman under the bed
translation.zh: 我告诉你们 危机四伏

translation.en: and that things are not right.
translation.zh: 情况不妙

translation.en: But we keep thinking, "Prices, discounts."
translation.zh: 但我们总是在想价格和折扣这些问题

translation.en: This is stupid. It's wrong.
translation.zh: 这种想法很傻 大错特错

translation.en: The diamond engagement ring is an emotional and spiritual gift that transcends the physical diamond
translation.zh: 钻石订婚戒指 是超越钻石本身的情感与精神礼物

translation.en: as it communicates the commitment of love forever.
translation.zh: 因为它能传达永恒的爱的承诺

translation.en: That is what we're selling.
translation.zh: 我们卖的是这个

translation.en: But we must have a heart.
translation.zh: 但我们必须要有一颗真心

translation.en: We must have a soul.
translation.zh: 必须要有灵魂

translation.en: Diamonds are a reflection of us.
translation.zh: 钻石反应的是我们

translation.en: You know, that light bouncing around? It's us.
translation.zh: 它折射出的光就是我们

translation.en: We… we, the people of the diamond industry. That's what these diamonds reflect.
translation.zh: 钻石折射出的 是我们钻石行业的从业者

translation.en: Know this, diamonds are a symbol. They're not a product, or a commodity.
translation.zh: 要知道 钻石是符号 不是产品或商品

translation.en: Good, huh?
translation.zh: 很好 是吧？

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: [Rapaport] When all is said and done, diamonds are only as good as we are.
translation.zh: 说到底 钻石的价值取决于我们的价值

translation.en: So I give us a blessing.
translation.zh: 所以我祝福大家

translation.en: May we be worthy of the product, of the symbolism that we sell.
translation.zh: 愿我们配得上 我们销售的产品及其象征意义

translation.en: May we be up to diamonds. Thank you.
translation.zh: 愿我们如钻石一般闪耀 谢谢大家

translation.en: [Simic] Ah, it's beautiful.
translation.zh: 很美

translation.en: ♪ My love will never die ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：朱音
